SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.reportviews.securityaccount

Class SecurityPositionSummary

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.reportviews.SecuritycurrencyPositionSummary<Security>
grafioschtrader.reportviews.securityaccount.SecurityPositionSummary
public class SecurityPositionSummary extends SecuritycurrencyPositionSummary<Security>
One for every single security. It contain also data of a single transaction, those data are probably transfered to other instance, for example when used for security transaction report.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    SecurityPositionSummary.TransactionsMarginOpenUnits
    Represents an individual open margin transaction with its associated close transactions for sophisticated margin position tracking.

      public void resetForOpenMargin()
      Resets position metrics for open margin calculation scenarios. Used when recalculating margin positions from transaction history, ensuring clean starting state for accurate position reconstruction.

      Parameters:

    • getPositionGainLossPercentage

      public double getPositionGainLossPercentage()
      Calculates percentage gain/loss for the entire position with margin instrument handling. Provides relative performance measurement that accounts for the different calculation methodologies required for standard instruments versus margin positions.
      Returns:
      percentage gain/loss for the position
